cause.description:
Telecommunications companies such as Verizon and Comcast want to increase their profits by forcing websites to pay fees to in order to use their telecommunications networks. Those who cannot afford to pay such fees will be forced to use low-bandwidth lines and will be effectively shut down. Essentially, the big telecommunications companies would be able to dictate what consumers can and cannot see on the Internet.
1. Net Neutrality should be maintained on a global level.
cause.mission: Our mission is to maintain Net Neutrality.
cause.name: Keep the Internet Free!
